column5: of schenectady died friday at the capital living nursing in schenectady. funeral services will be held on thursday at 12 noon at friendship baptist church
column8: followed by burial at park view cemetery. a calling hour will be held from 11 a. m. until 12 noon prior to the service at the church. www. sbfuneralhome. comupcoming events. visitationjun 11. 11:00 am - 12:00 pm friendship baptist church409 union street. schenectady
